column4: I'm running 7.10 on a Toshiba Satellite A105, and I can't get the fan to work, so in return my laptop overheats.
- type lsmod | grep tosh and see if you get any output. I'm fairly sure that there are kernel modules available for controlling acpi stuff ie fans etc
- if that command does not return any output, you will need to insert the required kernel modules using modprobe
